job.description: ltpgtSoftware Developer  Award Winning Fintech  up to 120000ltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtJob titleltstronggt Software DeveloperltpgtltpgtltstronggtClientltstronggt Multi Award Winning FintechltpgtltpgtltstronggtSalaryltstronggt Up to 120000  bonus  packageltpgtltpgtltstronggtLocationltstronggt BostonltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtMy client is doing exceptionally well at the moment so are looking to add a software developer to their expanding team You will join a company with a flat structure and gain a large amount of exposure to greenfield projects focusing on the finance arena They want someone that is eager to continue learning and someone with great energy who is keen to work in a fast paced environmentltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtCANDIDATE REQUIREMENTSltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligt2 years industry experience working in a software engineering roleltligtltligtDegree from reputable university with a high GPA in Computer scienceltligtltligtProficient with Java Python or CltligtltligtPassionate about technologyltligtltligtBubbly personality with a desire to learn and progressltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtDESIREABLEltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtExperience working in a tech role within financial services would be nice to haveltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtIf this suits you click apply and we can discuss the role in more depthltpgt
